name: forexradar
description: Track historical Visa and Mastercard exchange rates

scripts.lint: eslint js shared backend && stylelint css/**/*.css && htmlhint index.html && markdownlint-cli2
scripts.lint:fix: eslint js shared backend --fix && stylelint css/**/*.css --fix && markdownlint-cli2 --fix
scripts.postinstall: cd backend && bunx playwright install firefox chromium
scripts.test:all: bun run test:unit && bun run test:integration && bun run test:contract:action && bun run test:smoke && bun run test:e2e
scripts.test:smoke: bun run build && bunx playwright test --config=tests/playwright.smoke.config.js
scripts.test:e2e: bun run build && bunx playwright test --config=tests/playwright.e2e.config.js
scripts.test:contract: bun run test:contract:visa && bun run test:contract:ecb && bun run test:contract:mc
scripts.test:contract:action: bun run test:contract:visa && bun run test:contract:ecb
scripts.test:perf: echo "Performance tests temporarily disabled" # bun test tests/perf/*.test.js && bun run build && bunx playwright test --config=tests/playwright.perf.config.js
scripts.test:visual: bun run build && bunx playwright test --config=tests/playwright.visual.config.js
scripts.test:visual:update: bun run build && bunx playwright test --config=tests/playwright.visual.config.js --update-snapshots

author: Avish J
